label: ball
caption: In a lush green park, two energetic brown dogs, their tails wagging excitedly, chase after a bright red rubber ball as it bounces across the grassy terrain. The warm sunlight casts a pleasant glow on the scene, illuminating the joyful moment of play between the canine friends and their beloved ball. A gentle breeze rustles through the surrounding trees, adding to the idyllic atmosphere of carefree fun.
